testcase.classname: RBAC System › Role and Permission Definitions
testcase.name: should have all required roles defined

testcase.name: should have all required permissions defined

testcase.name: should have proper role-to-permission mapping

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Permission Checking Functions › hasPermission
testcase.name: should return true when user has the required permission

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Permission Checking Functions › hasPermission
testcase.name: should return false when user does not have the required permission

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Permission Checking Functions › hasAnyPermission
testcase.name: should return true when user has at least one of the required permissions

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Permission Checking Functions › hasAnyPermission
testcase.name: should return false when user has none of the required permissions

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Permission Checking Functions › hasAllPermissions
testcase.name: should return true when user has all required permissions

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Permission Checking Functions › hasAllPermissions
testcase.name: should return false when user is missing any required permission

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Role Hierarchy
testcase.name: admin should have more permissions than editor

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Role Hierarchy
testcase.name: editor should have more permissions than viewer

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Security Boundaries
testcase.name: viewer should not have any admin permissions

testcase.name: editor should not have system administration permissions

testcase.classname: RBAC System › Security Boundaries
testcase.name: only admin should have system management permissions

testcase.name: should prevent vertical privilege escalation

testcase.name: should enforce role hierarchy boundaries
